project_descr: Development and Confidence Building in the Chittagong Hill Tracts (CHT)

outputs.output_descr: Operational Support to ensure efficient programme delivery
Access to Quality Health and Education Services improved in Chittagong Hill Tracts (CHT) in Bangladesh.
Supporting local development in the Chittagong Hill Tracts Development Facility (CHTDF), a south eastern part of Bangladesh.
Agriculture and Food Security Project in the Chittagong Hill Tracts Phase II

USAID Support to Chittagong Hill Tracts (CHT) Watershed Co-Management
Activity” under its “Adaptive Environmental Governance for the Poor Programme (AEGP)
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: USAID Chittagong Hill Tracts (CHT) Health Service Delivery under UNDP Chittagong Hill Tracts Development Facility
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: Making formal and Informal justice system accessible for the CHT people
Conflict Prevention, Recovery and Peace-building in Chittagong Hill Tracts of Bangladesh
Communities empowered, livelihood and access to economic opportunities improved in Chittagong Hill Tracts (CHT) in Bangladesh
Peace-building, Human Security and Governance in Chittagong Hill Tracts of Bangladesh
Building the capacity of CHT institution and promotion of confidence building
This project is created to register the income and expenditure related to the education component of CHTDF. This is part of the Objective 2 of the Pro Doc.
This project is created to register the income and expenditure related to the Community Empowerment component of UNDP/CHTDF. This is the Objective 3 of the Pro Doc.
This project is created to register the income and expenditure related to the Confidence Building component of CHTDF. This is the Objective 4 of the Pro Doc.
